message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. I think it would be incredibly beneficial for you.  Given its value, I'm offering it at $11,500. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but the price is a little steep for me. Would you consider $9,000?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $9,000 is quite a bit below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice. To be honest, $10,000 is the absolute most I can justify spending on this. If you're willing to go there, I'm ready to close the deal.
